Description.Comment: New Submission. Generated by mothur version 1.43.0

Descriptor.Title: Rhizosphere microbiome of Phragmites australis in Michigan and Ohio, USA

Description.p: Here we describe the microbiome found in the rhizosphere of native and non-native Phragmites australis in Michigan and Ohio, USA. We use amplicon sequencing to identify bacterial, fungal, and oomycete communities in the rhizosphere.

Descriptor.Title: fungal sequences recoverd from bulk soil surrounding non-native Phragmitesfrom BC1

Description.p: fungal sequences recoverd from bulk soil surrounding non-native Phragmites

Attributes.Attribute: fungal sequences recoverd from bulk soil surrounding non-native Phragmites
fungal sequences recoverd from bulk soil surrounding non-native Phragmitesfrom BC1

"DNA extracted from soils samples using Qiagen PowerSoil PowerLyzer extraction kits, PCR amplified using ITS2 primers (Taylor et al. 2016), amplicons purified, normalized and sequenced on Illumina MiSeq using V2 chemistry"
